name: Lolly Vegas
description: '''Candido Albelando "Lolly" Vasquez-Vegas''' (October 2, 1939 â€“ March 4, 2010) was a [[Native Americans in the United States|Native American]] musician of [[Yaqui]], [[Shoshone]] and Mexican heritage. He played in numerous ensembles with his brother [[Pat Vegas|Pat]], including Pat & Lolly Vegas, [[The Avantis]], and [[Redbone (band)|Redbone.]]
